TopicTitle: Can someone identify this for me

Articles.Content:
Hi all , not sure if this is a request but it is a request for help, I used to have this parts pack "Lucern"???? something like that , it had 3 engines,2x 5m , and 1 , 10m 

here is a picture of the 5 metre engine in action , I cant find the pack online as I might have the name wrong , and I lost my old hard drive

![al7D8sP.png](http://imgur.com/al7D8sP.png)

they are nuclear and run on liquid fuel and ox

help!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T12:00:08Z" title="05/21/2015 12:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by sploooshman**

Ah yes, the Leucome fusion engines. One of my favourite mods, though I currently use a modified version of it. Alas, the only 'official' link I've got for these engines is dead, but I do have them myself. I haven't seen any activity from the guy who was supposed to be maintaining the mod for quite a while, so... [**here you go**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/031s2vlu275z4cq/Leucome.zip?dl=0). Updated to 1.0 for you (hopefully) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I should be alright sharing it, according to the readme file included, as I'm not claiming it's mine. That said, I think I'll send a PM to the guy who's supposed to be looking after the mod to see if he replies. If not, I might see about undertaking maintenance on this mod myself, maybe even expanding it a bit to include my modifications... hmm...

oh you absolute legend , last time i looked a long time ago i found the dead page of the guy that made it , so thanks , they go great with the PMI fuel gen and large solar sails , for cheating my way around RSS , however im sure one day we will discover a way to generate efficient fuel while on the go in space so im just a little ahead of our time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

thank so much
